title: PA-20-07: 2020 Annual Agency Ethics Program Questionnaire
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/A4C6BBB4D817B2DF852585DE005930A4/$FILE/PA-20-07 Annual Agency Ethics Program Questionnaire.pdf?open
summary: This Program Advisory explains how and when to submit the questionnaire response, describes the changes made from the 2019 questionnaire, and provides executive branch agencies with an advance copy of the 2020 questionnaire. In addition, this Advisory explains how OGE uses the data and reminds agencies of the public availability of the questionnaire.
